title: N.J. teenager shot in the chest, reports say
content:
Teenage boy shot at home in Mt. Laurel, N.J.
Disney account
MOUNT LAUREL -- A 17-year-old was taken to the hospital late Saturday night after he was shot in the chest, 6abc reports.
The teenager was shot inside a house at the 3300 block of Marne Highway at 11:30 p.m., according to reports.
Emergency personnel transported the teen to Cooper Medical Center in Camden.
The 17-year-old was last reported with stable vital signs.
MORE: Mount Laurel police blotter: Armed man robs prostitute, secret shopper applicant scammed
Further information on the shooting is not known at this time.
The incident remains under investigation as authorities work to determine what caused the shooting.
